    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(int appointmentId, Connection connection) throws SQLException
      Deletes an appointment based on the appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to delete
      connection - The database connection object
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs, this method is called on a closed PreparedStatement, or the given SQL statement produces anything other than a single ResultSet object

    • hasOverlappingAppointment

      public boolean hasOverlappingAppointment(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime, int customerId) throws SQLException
      Checks if the customer has an overlapping appointment.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The start time of the selected appointment.
      endTime - The end time of the selected appointment.
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      true if there is an overlapping appointment, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • hasOverlappingAppointmentExceptCurrent

      public boolean hasOverlappingAppointmentExceptCurrent(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime, int customerId, int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      Checks if the customer has an overlapping appointment, excluding the appointment with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The start time of the selected appointment.
      endTime - The end time of the selected appointment.
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment being updated.
      Returns:
      true if there is an overlapping appointment, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
